Steve Ballmer himself weighed in at the meeting between the two presidents and US business leaders, according to statement on Microsoft's blog. At the meeting, Steve Ballmer highlighted the importance of intellectual property, or IP, to the future success and economic development of both countries, and noted the serious IP piracy problems that currently exist in China, the statement said. It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . IT involved. SharePoint is a great bridge for that," said Steve Ballmer in an interview with InformationWeek. When asked what SharePoint brings to the table that other Web development platforms don't, Steve Ballmer responded Well, you can do anything with anything. The question is, how much work is it? What we're trying to do is essentially give the people who build these sites a higher-level set of tools, so they're not reinventing the wheel. Can we provide infrastructure that ties in and lets the end user participate, and is done in a very high-quality, finished way for those folks? And we think the answer is yes. Steve Ballmer 's keynote also discussed Microsoft's commitment to SharePoint in the cloud. The company already has more than one million users signed up for SharePoint Online, a hosted version of the software. SharePoint Online
